attributes.title: ✨🧚‍♂️💫Absolute GARBAGE🧚‍♂️✨💫
attributes.review: Downloaded the app and within the first few seconds a disfigured Cheeto appeared on the screen. To be honest it scared the daylights out of me. Do ✨not✨ suggest the download.

attributes.title: gave me aids😪
attributes.review: i downloaded daddy trumps to show support after these zoomers completely ruined papa donnie’s rally and when i opened the app it gave my phone a virus and somehow i contracted aids😬now normally i don’t believe in viruses bc my bunker baby told me it was a hoax but now i have to write a review from my tablet🤦🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: trump hanging on buy a limb chile
attributes.review: this app worse than his 2020 campaign please remove it it’s making your app store look bad DO NOT RECOMMEND ✋🏽.

attributes.title: disgustanggggg
attributes.review: i wanted to see what the app was like and the results were predictable. right when u open it u have to see this horrible orange creature standing there. right as i saw that i was so frightened i immediately deleted the app. please remove this app right away.

attributes.title: LONG LIVE TIKTOK
attributes.review: thank you so much for deleting our beloved app. just want to let u know that gen z is coming for u🙈🙈better keep an eye out for selener 👁👄👁

attributes.title: Keep an eye out for selenor
attributes.review: Immediately when I got this app I got a virus called selenor, it drained everything, keep an eye out for selenor

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it keeps bringing me to a porn website with pictures of trump nude I am horrified

i downloaded the app to learn about our orange 🍊 president but then the app kept on crashing 💔 and jump scares of trumpets 🎺 face kept on appearing every time i opened the app... kinda scary? 😣 i had high hopes that i could learn about what brand of self tanner you’re using but it’s fine 😔✌️

attributes.title: TikTok 🙈✨
attributes.review: This is the worst app so many bugs and glitches when I open it,it logs out
